entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning and ending late this afternoon then 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain. Blowing snow at times late this morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind south 30 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this morning then diminishing to 30 late this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
